name: edwards-webdev-monorepo
description: Edwards Web Development - Professional web development business website

scripts.build:ci: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend && npm run build:tournament && npm run copy
scripts.build:all:ci: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend && npm run build:tournament && npm run copy:frontend
scripts.copy:frontend: if exist backend\public rmdir /S /Q backend\public && xcopy /E /I /Y frontend\dist\edwards-webdev-frontend\* backend\public\
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.clean: rimraf backend/dist frontend/dist edwards-webdev-production.zip production-package.json DEPLOYMENT.md
scripts.zip: powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "$dest='dist-release'; if(Test-Path $dest){Remove-Item -Recurse -Force $dest}; New-Item -ItemType Directory -Force $dest | Out-Null; Compress-Archive -Path 'backend/dist','backend/public','backend/.env','backend/package.json','backend/package-lock.json','tournament-app/server','tournament-app/client/dist/retro-never-dies-client','ecosystem.all.config.js','package.json','package-lock.json' -DestinationPath ($dest + '/release.zip') -Force"
scripts.release: npm run build:ci && npm run zip

author: Edwards Web Development
